job_details.Vacaturetitel: Mendix Engineer met oog voor AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Zelfstandig generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps.
     * Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen.
     * Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen.
job_details.full_text:
Mendix Engineer met oog voor AI

* Zelfstandig generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps.
     * Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen.
     * Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on implementing generative AI services within Mendix apps and collaborating with data scientists on ML models. It emphasizes exploring new AI possibilities and developing solutions with clients, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on generative models and application development.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the implementation of generative AI services, which falls under the core process of creating or adapting AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration on developing and refining machine learning models, a key aspect of the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding client needs and translating them into AI-driven solutions, demonstrating business understanding and application development.

job_tasks.phrase: generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps
job_tasks.justification: Implementing AI services within a specific application platform (Mendix) implies software development and integration tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen
